Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check GET DNS CONFIGURATION test when DUT return correct response

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-2-1-4 GET DNS CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned DNSInformation STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Validate DNS information STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: No response
Test.Description: Check GET DNS CONFIGURATION test when DUT return no response.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-2-1-4 GET DNS CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Fault
Test.Description: Check GET DNS CONFIGURATION test when DUT return fault.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-2-1-4 GET DNS CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetDNS() in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 469 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
